document_data.caption: ''3e map of Halruaa, with the Great Swamp of Rethild to the east.''
document_data.name: Great Swamp of Rethild
document_data.mainbody: The '''Great Swamp of Rethild''', also known simply as the '''Great Swamp''' or '''Rethild''' and '''Kethid''', was a swamp in [[Dambrath]].
document_data.Description: The Great Swamp was filled with [[moss]], [[cypress]] trees, and [[zalantar]] trees and was home to [[giant leech]]es, [[giant toad]]s, and [[giant snake]]s. It was always muggy and full of biting insects. Noxious vapors came up through the water and hung above the ground in great clouds of yellow, brown, or green gas. Some of these gases were poisonous or carried diseases, such as [[cackle fever]] and [[mindfire]].
document_data.Trade: One of the trade exports of note from this region was Rethild-weave silk.<ref>
document_data.Geography:
{{Climate/Shining South/Forest and marsh|Rethild}}
The Great Swamp was located on the western border of Dambrath. It was separated from [[Halruaa]] by the [[East Wall]] mountains.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Great Swamp was home to numerous tribes of [[lizardfolk]], [[bullywug]]s, and [[tasloi]]. The [[black dragon]] [[Valraxaxath]] dwelt in the center of the swamp in a ruined city.
document_data.Locations:
* [[Kethid]], the nation of lizardfolk, who were famous for their mercenaries.
* [[Rethild (city)|Rethild]], a lizardfolk settlement in the center of the swamp.
document_data.History:
It was once home to a city of [[sarrukh]]s.

In [[1372 DR]] the lizardfolk kingdom led by [[Ghassis]] was known as Kethid.  By the year [[1472 DR]], its name had changed to [[Ilimar]].
